default.signature:
function ConfirmationPage() { return (

Order Confirmed!

Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been successfully placed and a confirmation email has been sent to your inbox.

); }

function CheckoutSummary({ subtotal, discount, tax, total, totalItems, user, onUserChange, }: CheckoutSummaryProps) { return (

Order Summary

Items ({totalItems}) Subtotal: ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Discount: -${discount.toFixed(2)}
Tax ({user.state}): ${tax.toFixed(2)}
Order Total: ${total.toFixed(2)}

Customer Details (for calculation)

onUserChange({ ...user, email: e.target.value })} placeholder="customer@example.com" className="text-sm" />
onUserChange({ ...user, state: e.target.value.toUpperCase() })} placeholder="e.g., CA, NY" maxLength={2} className="text-sm" />
); }
